Title: Requires regulating bodies provide businesses with notice of new rules and regulations
Summary: Requires regulating bodies provide businesses with notice of new rules and regulations within sixty days of such rule or regulation being filed with the secretary of state; provides businesses are given one hundred eighty days to comply with any such rules or regulations.
LawCode: Amd ยง202, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state administrative procedure act, in relation to requiring regulating bodies provide certain businesses with notice of new rules and regulations
